text: one out of five teenagers had some form
of hearing loss due to noise exposure
and much of that noise exposures from
ear buds in the year where an individual

hairs in the cochlea and you're shearing

increasing sound by 3 to 6 dB doubles
the intensity of the sound
if you're using an earbud a good rule is
60% of the volume no more than 60
minutes a day to practice hearing
conservation I would tell individuals to
use noise cancelling headphones a lot of

which allows us to reduce the volume of
